attributes.action: Add Romanian to the Modern Languages GCSE
attributes.additional_details: The Government have the most power and are in charge of the GCSE subjects
attributes.background: The Government should add Romanian to the languages included in the GCSE Modern Languages curriculum. This would allow students, including Romanians living in the UK, to study the language in school. This should help the many Romanians in the UK who would like an extra GCSE.
